text: Ara yara ihudi mata posana kare tadera jan'ya amara nisedha karechilama pratyeka abibhakta khura-bisista prani, ara garu o mesera madhye tadera jan'ya amara nisedha karechilama ubhayera carbi, tabe ya jarita thakata tadera pithe ba antre, athaba ya sanyukta thakata harera sange ta byatita. Ebhabe tadera amara pratiphala diyechilama tadera abadhyatara jan'ya, ara nihsandeha amara satyaparayana.
